0: (CNN) -- Venezuelan President Hugo Chavez has returned to his country after undergoing a second round of chemotherapy in Cuba, state media reported Sunday. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR State broadcaster VTV showed images of the leader's return. A group of government ministers were among those who greeted him at the airport. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "Good morning, beloved homeland," Chavez posted on his Twitter account Sunday. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "What a beautiful full moon greeted us at midnight," he added. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Chavez announced in June that doctors in Cuba had removed a cancerous tumor from his body, but he has not specified what type
